Ingredients.2: 1 (15.25 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained

Ingredients.9: 1 salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

Directions.2: Combine back beans, avocado, and lime juice in a bowl. Gently stir to combine. Divide mixture between tostada shells. Top each tostada with a slice of cheese.

Directions.3: Heat oil in a small skillet over medium-high heat. Crack an egg into the hot oil. Cook for 2 minutes. Flip and cook until set, 2 minutes more. Transfer egg to the top of one of the prepared tostada shells. Repeat with remaining eggs.

Directions.4: Top each egg with salsa. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve immediately.
